mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, user_no as userNo, title, content, view_cnt as viewCnt, reg_date as regDate, file_path as filePath FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_cnt = view_cnt+1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_no, title, content, file_path) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, file_path=#{filePath}, reg_date=now() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
